mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bjxx (BJMC, XXDM, jb, BZRGZRYM, BZRXM, BJLX, YSYZ, MZYYSKYZ) VALUES (#{bjmc}, #{xxdm}, #{jb}, #{bzrgzrym}, #{bzrxm}, #{bjlx}, #{ysyz}, #{mzyyskyz})
mapper.select: SELECT ksh, sfzjh, xm, bjmc FROM ksxx where bjbs = #{bjbs}
SELECT ks.KSH, ks.SFZJH, ks.XM, bj.BJMC FROM ksxx ks INNER JOIN xyzdk xx ON ks.XXDM = xx.DM AND xx.JH = 'ZX' INNER JOIN bjxx bj ON xx.DM = bj.XXDM WHERE bj.BJBS = #{bjbs} AND ks.KJZTMC = '正常在校'
mapper.update: UPDATE ksxx SET BJBS = NULL, BJMC = NULL WHERE BJBS = #{bjbs}
